basics.name: Sri Charitha Etta
basics.label: Senior Consultant and Team Lead
basics.summary: Highly motivated Data Warehouse Developer with 8.4 years of experience and a proven track record of success in ETL, data management, and production support. Expertise in Informatica Power Center, Informatica Developer, Informatica Cloud, Informatica IDMC, UNIX shell scripting, Oracle11g Database, PL/SQL, and MSSQL server. Additionally, 1.5 years of experience in SAPC Callidus Applications and 3 years of expertise in MDM Hub configurations.

work.summary: Working with Takeda Pharmaceuticals to gather requirements from stakeholders, develop project estimates, and design data models for Trial, Site, and PI domains. Utilizes Informatica Cloud Profiling for high data quality and implements MDM solutions using Informatica IDMC.
highlights: Develop accurate project scope, timeline, and resource estimates
Implement data quality checks and monitoring procedures
Lead a team of 5 members, fostering collaboration and productivity
Hands-on ETL development using Informatica Cloud tools

work.summary: Worked with Tyson Foods, specializing in requirements gathering and ETL development for Material, Supplier, and Customer domains using Informatica Cloud. Conducted data profiling to ensure high data quality.
highlights: Finalized source data elements from multiple sources
Increased efficiency through address doctor transformation for address standardization

work.summary: Led the team in gathering requirements and preparing standard data models for Material, Supplier, and Customer domains. Conducted POCs for various IICS Connectors and addressed data validation.
highlights: Created rules in IDQ for Address, Phone, and Email Validation
Conducted POCs for IICS Connectors and reading XML data

work.summary: Developed ETL and MDM solutions for RedHat using Informatica IDQ and Informatica MDM. Prepared decks for design implementations of MDM concepts.
highlights: Finalized data model for Party Domain
Prepared decks for Match and Merge design

work.summary: Developed ETL solutions for FORD using Informatica IDQ. Managed end-to-end data loads in both DEV and TEST environments.
highlights: Finalized data model for Finance Domain
Facilitated communication between source and target system teams

work.company: Micro Focus Application, SAP Callidus Cloud
work.summary: Led the team for Claims Validations and Disputes creation using Callidus functionalities.
Worked with the ESCS commission payment system to serve Anthem's commission calculations. Focused on Informatica, Java, and Callidus functionalities.
highlights: Lead the Informatica team for ESCS LO
Utilized Oracle 11g, SQL, PL/SQL, and SAP Crystal Reports 2013

work.summary: Worked primarily with Siebel Data EIM and Informatica for a major health insurance provider in the USA.
highlights: Served a Blue Cross Blue Shield licensee in 14 states

work.summary: Contributed to a successful project on 'Third Party Transfer' and participated in design workshops.
highlights: Volunteer for Paper Presentation at Headstart 2013
Organized Headstart 2014 for the Technical Computer Science Engineering Department

courses: Trained in C, C++, Java, Advanced Java, J2EE, MySQL
Participated in Information Security and Cyber Forensics workshop at IIT Hyderabad
